channel.title: [637] Dementhium -- Portals to teleport you multiple places
channel.description:
How can I add portals on the ground, and then step in them and they give you multiple places to teleport? Such as Rock Crabs, Pyrefiends, and other monsters..
How can I add that? Any help is appreciated, thanks.
